## NgwConnector.setNgw() method

Fast way to specify the connection address to NextGIS Web. The current connection will be severed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setNgw(baseUrl: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  baseUrl | string | NGW url |

**Returns:**

void
